paragraphs.content: And in that day thou shalt say: O Lord, I will praise thee; though thou wast angry with me thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And in that day thou shalt say: O Lord, I will praise thee; though thou wast angry with me thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.

paragraphs.content: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid; for the Lord JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also has become my salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid; for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also has become my salvation.

paragraphs.content: Therefore, with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore, with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.

paragraphs.content: And in that day shall ye say: Praise the Lord, call upon his name, declare his doings among the people, make mention that his name is exalted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And in that day shall ye say: Praise the Lord, call upon his name, declare his doings among the people, make mention that his name is exalted.

paragraphs.content: Sing unto the Lord; for he hath done excellent things; this is known in all the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sing unto the Lord; for he hath done excellent things; this is known in all the earth.

paragraphs.content: Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion; for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion; for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
